member.name: T:CATRAN_Mail.Class_Mail
member.summary:
This class handles interfacing with Outlook to send eMail messages.
Internal Variables:
Delay_Timer - 2 dimensional array 1st entry = Minimum number of recipients 2nd entry = seconds of delay between sending emails

member.name: P:CATRAN_Mail.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CATRAN_Mail.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:CATRAN_Mail.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
